keyMoments.title: Heart Pirates Arrive at Marineford
keyMoments.description: The Heart Pirates arrive at Marineford in their submarine, the Polar Tang, with Law offering to save Luffy's life as a doctor.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the Heart Pirates' intervention in the war and the beginning of their role in saving Luffy. This establishes the foundation for the future alliance between Law and Luffy.

keyMoments.title: Whitebeard Commanders Protect Luffy
keyMoments.description: Marco, Vista, and the other Whitebeard Division Commanders stand before Akainu to protect Luffy's escape, honoring Whitebeard's and Ace's wishes.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's commitment to honoring their fallen captain and Ace by protecting the one they recognized.

keyMoments.title: Blackbeard Demonstrates Stolen Power
keyMoments.description: Blackbeard threatens to sink Marineford using Whitebeard's stolen Gura Gura no Mi power.
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration of the Blackbeard Pirates' enhanced power with two Devil Fruits.

keyMoments.title: Blackbeard Pirates vs Sengoku
keyMoments.description: The entire Blackbeard crew is sent flying by Sengoku's Buddha form shockwave.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that despite their new power, they still face formidable Marine opposition.
